name: Google-Books-Search
description: In this activity, I created a new React-based Google Books Search app. This app was created with React components, work with helper/util functions, and utilize React lifecycle methods to query and display books based on user searches. I used Node, Express and MongoDB so that users can save books to review or purchase later.

scripts.start: nodemon || if-env NODE_ENV=production && npm run start:prod || npm run start:dev || node backend/server.js
scripts.heroku-postbuild: NPM_CONFIG_PRODUCTION=false npm install npm && run build
